      • getActions

        public java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JButton> getActions()
        Description copied from interface: CardGame
        This method is meant to grab any and all global action buttons associated with a given game.
        Specified by:
        getActions in interface CardGame
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type JButton representing the table actions that can be performed by any player. (works together with ActionListener) Warning In a future update there will be another method similar to this one. The future method will grab player specific action buttons as opposed to global action buttons.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Description copied from interface: CardGame
        This method is used by TableTop to grab the current message that game should be displaying. This method gets called once per action. Right after this method is called, clearMessage() is called to reset the message variable.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface CardGame
        Returns:
        the message that is currently saved.

        getHand in interface CardGame
        Returns:
